name: Tater Tots® with Gochujang Cheese Sauce
author: thedailygourmet
summary: Air-fried tots are paired with a spicy, deluxe cheese sauce.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen bite-size potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®)
1 tablespoon gochujang (Korean hot pepper paste), or more to taste
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 370 degrees F (188 degrees C)
Cook potato nuggets in the preheated air fryer until crispy and heated through, about 15 minutes, shaking the air fryer basket halfway through cooking time
Meanwhile, heat a saucepan over medium-high heat
Add Cheddar cheese and cream; whisk until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes
Add gochujang and salt and stir until combined
